vote.title:
16.Agreement with Healthcare and Emergency Animal Rescue Team to Provide 
Spay and Neutering Services for Qualifying Low -Income Residents
vote.description:
Department(s): Planning and Building Agency 
Recommended Action: Authorize the City Manager to execute an agreement with 
Healthcare and Emergency Animal Rescue Team (HEART) to provide veterinarian 
medical services for a spay and neutering program to low-income Santa Ana 
residents for a three-year term commencing April 3, 2024 and expiring March 18, 
2027, with provisions for two one-year extensions, in an amount not to exceed 
$75,000 (Agreement No. A-2024-042).
